items.title: Trump defends ICE, seeks to define shooting before facts are established
items.description: Trump seized on partial video footage to impose his interpretation of the shooting as investigators worked to establish the facts.

items.title: Rep. Steny Hoyer to retire, ending storied career in elected office
items.description: Maryland’s longest serving member of Congress won’t seek reelection after having spent two decades as the No. 2 House Democrat.
